price: Ishee jalaa “Hin gaddin; dhugumatti, Gooftaan kee jala keetti laga xiqqoo taasiseera” jechuun isheetti lallabe.
arabic: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحۡتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحۡزَنِي قَدۡ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحۡتَكِ سَرِيّٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fanādāhā min taḥtihā allā taḥzanī qad jaʿala rabbuki taḥtaki sariyyan
